thought: To craft a shears I need two iron ingots. I have one iron block in my inventory, which can be converted into 9 iron ingots. I will start by moving the iron block into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 23 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 9
